Remember, remember: five looks for November – in pictures
01 Nov 2019, 16:12 by Melanie Wilkinson

Time to grab your puffer jackets and fluffy bucket hats for some stylish, pre- Christmas fun




Winter market
Dress, £64, stories.com Polo neck, £135 by Commando from selfridges.com Jacket, £59.99, zara.com Trainers, £89.99 by Adidas from office.co.uk Hat, £8, rokit.co.uk This article contains affiliate links, which means we may earn a small commission if a reader clicks through and makes a purchase. All our journalism is independent and is in no way influenced by any advertiser or commercial initiative. By clicking on an affiliate link, you accept that third-party cookies will be set. More information.



Thanksgiving with friends
Coat, £85, monki.com Jeans, £69, cosstores.com Jumper, £175 by Iris & Ink from theoutnet.com Bag, £75, americanvintage-store.com Shoes, £59.99, zara.com



First party of the season
Dress, £65, warehouse.co.uk Blazer, £295, reiss.com Boots, £78, dunelondon.com Earrings, £69, daisyjewellery.com Bag, £14.99, hm.com



Christmas shopping
Skirt, £110, jcrew.com Jumper, £260, ganni.com Bag, £69, arket.com Trainers, £80 by Veja from matchesfashion.com Bracelet, £380, monicavinader.com



Bonfire night
Trousers, £19.99, bershka.com Body, £65 by Ninety Percent from net-a-porter.com Jacket, £82, abercrombie.com Shoes, £79.99 by Buffalo from office.co.uk Hat, £22, urbanoutfitters.com
